parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240063) at the end.  This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance transparency and are mandated for electoral advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Alternativa pentru Demnitatea Națională - ADN" and its candidate Costin Movila, specifying their position (12) for the Chamber of Deputies. This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate and party participating in the election, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this advertisement targets a wide audience, not just individuals.  The reach estimate (100K - 500K) further confirms its broad reach, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is clearly to encourage voters to support Costin Movila and ADN. The phrasing "Votam..." (We vote...) directly calls for a specific voting action. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c, demonstrating an explicit electoral objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content lacks any journalistic elements. It's not presenting news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it's a direct appeal for votes. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and impartiality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>This is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of a candidate and party, aiming to influence electoral outcomes.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>993705712527586</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It explicitly mentions a candidate and party, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose ADN and Costin Movila. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is also a crucial factor.  There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Costin Movila</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FRP</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Federatia Romanilor de Pretutindeni, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei reclame electorale pe Facebook (ID postare: 993705712527586), cu cheltuieli estimate intre 400 si 499 RON, care promoveaza candidatul Costin Movila de la Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala (ADN) pentru Camera Deputatilor, pozitia 12, cu un mesaj explicit de îndemn la vot ("Votam..."), avand ca efect electoral cresterea numarului de voturi pentru candidatul mentionat, fapt demonstrat de prezenta CMF-ului 11240063 si de datele din Ad Library privind acoperirea estimata de 100.000-500.000 de persoane.  Aceasta reclama constituie propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie, fiind astfel ilegala. Contact: sedecoro@gmail.com, +40774533702, Strada Italia 4, Chiajna , Ilfov 077040, RO.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
